content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

DROP TABLE [wwi].[DimCity]

CREATE TABLE [wwi].[DimCity]
( 
	[CityKey] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[WWICityID] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[City] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[StateProvince] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[Country] [nvarchar](60)  NOT NULL,
	[Continent] [nvarchar](30)  NOT NULL,
	[SalesTerritory] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[Region] [nvarchar](30)  NOT NULL,
	[Subregion] [nvarchar](30)  NOT NULL,
	[LatestRecordedPopulation] [bigint]  NOT NULL,
	[ValidFrom] [datetime2](7)  NOT NULL,
	[ValidTo] [datetime2](7)  NOT NULL,
	[LineageKey] [int]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO wwi.DimCity
(CityKey 1, WWICityID 2, City 3, StateProvince 4, Country 5, Continent 6, SalesTerritory 7, Region 8, Subregion 9, LatestRecordedPopulation 10, ValidFrom 11, ValidTo 12, LineageKey 13)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-dimcity.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.DimCity
GO
